name: Athos Bulcão Hplus Executive
description: Located beside Brasilia Shopping Centre, Athos Bulcão offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available, as well as a gym. The property is only 1,5 km from Mané Garrincha Stadium. Air-conditioned rooms at Athos feature a flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is also a dining table. Extras include cable channels. Some room categories offer humidifiers. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the mornings and it includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of beverages. The hotel is 4.1 km from Lake Paranoa, 3 km from Esplanada dos MInistérios area and 1.6 km from Caixa Cultural Center. Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek Airport is 20 km away.

name: Windsor Plaza Brasilia
description: Located in Brasilia and within 1.7 km of Cultural Complex of the Republic, Windsor Plaza Brasilia features a bar, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi. Providing a restaurant, the property also has an outdoor swimming pool, as well as a fitness centre and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, every room has a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Windsor Plaza Brasilia have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Brasília Cathedral is 2 km from Windsor Plaza Brasilia, while Central Bank of Brazil is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Blue Tree Premium Jade Brasilia
description: Jade Hotel Brasília is set in Brasilia, only 450 metres from Park Design Shopping. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, Toro Parrila. Free private parking and free WiFi are available. Jade Hotel Brasília features a water complex containing 5 outdoor swimming pools, one of them with access to the sauna and also a semi-Olympic swimming pool. All air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a minibar. Bathrooms are private and are equipped with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Jade Hotel Brasília also has a 24-hour front desk at the property. Conjunto Nacional Mall is 8 km away from the hotel. Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Brasilia Alvorada
address: Setor Hoteleiro Sul Quadra 04 Bloco A, Brasilia 70322-909
description: Thank you for choosing our Ramada by Wyndham Brasilia Alvorada Hotel. Ramada by Wyndham Brasilia Alvorada is a hotel with privileged location in Brazil's Federal Capital, closest to Brasilia TV TOWER and its traditional fair. Guests will enjoy comfortable rooms with flat screen TVs, air conditioning, minibar, and more. Ramada by Wyndham Brasilia Alvorada offers complimentary breakfast, onsite restaurant, free wi-fi, a free fitness center, pool, dry and steam sauna. Parking area is available and this is a pet friendly hotel.Wyndham

name: ibis Styles Brasilia Aeroporto
address: Aeroporto Internacional de Brasilia, Setor de Concessionárias, Lote 2, Brasilia 71608-900
description: Looking for a hotel in Brasilia for ease and comfort? ibis Styles Brasília Aeroporto is perfect. Cozy rooms decorated with famous architecture, with A/C, free WiFi and soundproofing. The restaurant changes its menu every day, plus 24/7 bar with pool and pinball, including TV and sports channels. Furthermore, we're pet friendly (for a fee).accorhotels.com

name: Alvimar Hotel
address: Quadra Central, Setor Hoteleiro, Bloco 05, Sobradinho 73010-535
description: Alvimar Hotel is located in Sobradinho and offers free WiFi, free public parking and a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and shops (on site). Located in the city centre, the hotel is just beside the city's bus station. Practical rooms at Hotel Alvimar are ideally fitted with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a wonderful breakfast at the property. Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport is 28 km away. Sobradinho Sports Gymnasium is 200 metres away.

name: Joy Hostel
description: Set in Brasilia and with Conjunto Nacional Mall reachable within 1.9 km, Joy Hostel & Suítes offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is located 3.2 km from Cultural Complex of the Republic, 1.9 km from Estadio Brasilia and 3.7 km from Brasília Cathedral. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. The units feature bed linen. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Central Bank of Brazil is 3.8 km from the hostel, while National Congress of Brazil is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 19 km from Joy Hostel & Suítes.

name: Windsor Brasilia Hotel
address: Shn, Quadra 1, Conjunto A, Bloco A, Brasilia 70702-900
description: Offering an indoor pool and a restaurant, Windsor Brasilia Hotel is located in Brasilia, 1 km from Parque da Cidade park. Free WiFi access is available. Conjunto Nacional Mall is only a few steps away. Daily breakfast is served free of charge. Each room here provides guests with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, cable channels and a minibar. Private bathroom also comes with a shower. Extras include a safety deposit box. At Windsor Brasilia Hotel guests will find a fitness centre, 24-hour front desk and laundry services. The property offers free private parking upon reservation. The hotel is 6.8 km from Praça do Três Poderes square. Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport is 8 km away.

name: Intercity Brasilia Led Águas Claras
description: Set in Taguatinga, 600 metres from Taguatinga Shopping Mall, Intercity Brasilia Led Aguas Claras features views of the city. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Intercity Brasilia Led Aguas Claras can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Intercity Brasilia Led Aguas Claras offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and sun terrace. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Hb
address: Rua Quintino Bocaiuva Quadra 18 Lote-14, Planaltina 73330-068
description: Located in Planaltina, 36 km from Iguatemi Shopping, Hotel HB provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is situated 42 km from Estadio Brasilia, 42 km from Conjunto Nacional Mall and 43 km from Cultural Complex of the Republic. The hotel features family rooms. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Hotel HB each room comes with a private bathroom and bed linen. The reception at the accommodation can provide tips on the area. Brasília Cathedral is 43 km from Hotel HB, while Central Bank of Brazil is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 58 km from the hotel.

name: Star Hotel
description: Situated within 22 km of Estadio Brasilia and 23 km of Cultural Complex of the Republic, Star Hotel features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Taguatinga. Located around 23 km from Conjunto Nacional Mall, the hotel with free WiFi is also 23 km away from Central Bank of Brazil. There is a restaurant serving Brazilian cuisine, and free private parking is available. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Star Hotel rooms include bed linen and towels. Staff at the accommodation are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk. Brasília Cathedral is 23 km from Star Hotel, while National Congress of Brazil is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: TRYP by Wyndham Brasilia Nacoes
address: Shs Quadra 4 Bloco I South North Asa Sul, Brasilia 70322-907
description: No description found

name: Cabana Nature Camp
description: Boasting a hot tub, Cabana Nature Camp is situated in Brasilia. With free private parking, the property is 31 km from Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil and 32 km from Square of the Three Powers. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Brasília Cathedral is 32 km from the luxury tent, while Palace of Justice is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 41 km from Cabana Nature Camp.

name: Premier Residence
address: Shtn Trecho 1, Lote 2, Bloco 1 - Apto. 102, Brasilia 70800-200
description: Set in Brasilia, 4.7 km from Palace of Justice and 5.3 km from National Congress of Brazil, Premier Residence offers a fitness centre and air conditioning. There is an in-house restaurant, plus free private parking and free WiFi are available. The aparthotel has an infinity pool with a pool bar, as well as a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The 1-bedroom aparthotel has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the aparthotel. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available. The aparthotel boasts a variety of wellness options, including wellness packages, beauty services and yoga classes. For guests with children, the aparthotel offers outdoor play equipment. A water park and an indoor play area are available at Premier Residence, while guests can also relax in the garden. Square of the Three Powers is 5.6 km from the accommodation, while Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil is 5.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from Premier Residence.

name: Flat Jade hotel Brasília
description: Situated in Brasilia, 12 km from Estadio Brasilia, Flat no Jade hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 13 km of Central Bank of Brazil. The hotel has a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil is 14 km from Flat no Jade hotel, while Cultural Complex of the Republic is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Salão De Festas Taguapark
description: Situated in Taguatinga and only 19 km from Estadio Brasilia, SALÃO DE FESTAS TAGUAPARK features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is located 20 km from Cultural Complex of the Republic, 20 km from Conjunto Nacional Mall and 21 km from Central Bank of Brazil. Brasília Cathedral is 21 km away and National Congress of Brazil is 22 km from the holiday park. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Palace of Justice is 22 km from the holiday park, while Square of the Three Powers is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from SALÃO DE FESTAS TAGUAPARK.

name: Life Resort, Beira Lago Paranoá
address: Shtn Trecho 2 Lote 3 Bloco i AP 411 Life Resort, Brasilia 70800-230
description: Set in Brasilia, 4.5 km from Palace of Justice, Life Resort, Beira Lago Paranoá offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Brazilian cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Life Resort, Beira Lago Paranoá offers a children's playground. National Congress of Brazil is 5.2 km from the accommodation, while Brasília Cathedral is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from Life Resort, Beira Lago Paranoá.

name: Hotel Riacho
description: Set in Brasilia, 25 km from Central Bank of Brazil, Hotel RIACHO offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 26 km from Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel RIACHO also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a city view. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar. An à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Cultural Complex of the Republic is 26 km from Hotel RIACHO, while Estadio Brasilia is 26 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Brasilflats Athos duplex
description: Situated in Brasilia, less than 1 km from Conjunto Nacional Mall, Brasilflats Athos duplex features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Cultural Complex of the Republic. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Estadio Brasilia is 1.8 km from Brasilflats Athos duplex, while Brasília Cathedral is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Dayuse Em Luxuoso Resort - Não Inclui Quarto
description: Dayuse em luxuoso resort - NÃO INCLUI QUARTO, a property with a bar, is set in Brasilia, 4.5 km from Palace of Justice, 5.3 km from National Congress of Brazil, as well as 5.3 km from Brasília Cathedral. This luxury tent has a private pool, a garden and free private parking. Outdoor dining is also possible at the luxury tent. Square of the Three Powers is 5.5 km from Dayuse em luxuoso resort - NÃO INCLUI QUARTO, while Conjunto Nacional Mall is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Chalé palomino
description: Chalé palomino has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Brasilia, 24 km from Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge. Guests can also relax in the garden. Square of the Three Powers is 24 km from the lodge, while Brasília Cathedral is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 34 km from Chalé palomino.

name: Rancho Pr
description: Set 24 km from Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil, RANCHO PR offers a garden, and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. A microwave and kettle are also offered. Square of the Three Powers is 24 km from the lodge, while Brasília Cathedral is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 34 km from RANCHO PR.

name: The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível
address: Shtn Trecho 2 lote 4 - Asa Norte, Brasília - DF, Brasil, Brasilia 70800-220
description: Situated in Brasilia, 4 km from Palace of Justice, The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation offers a kids' club and a 24-hour front desk for guests. All rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. At The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a hot spring bath. National Congress of Brazil is 4.8 km from The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível, while Brasília Cathedral is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from the resort.

name: Apart Hotel Tagua life
description: Located in Taguatinga, 22 km from Central Bank of Brazil and 23 km from Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil, Apart Hotel Tagua life offers an outdoor swimming pool and air conditioning. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk. With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom aparthotel provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in the aparthotel. The property offers inner courtyard views. Guests can also relax in the garden. Cultural Complex of the Republic is 23 km from the aparthotel, while Estadio Brasilia is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 15 km from Apart Hotel Tagua life.
